message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $115. I think you'll find it's a very fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product and am willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $110 for this product. It truly is worth it.
Hello Alice, I understand your valuation of the product, but I would like to stick to my previous offer of $100. I hope we can come to an agreement.
